column4: Trying to get my wifi pcmcia card to work. Its a Hawking card (with texas instrumunts chipset). I followed the howto's using niswrapper and got the link light to turn on. I just can't get it to connect to the internet.
Any catch-22's, or something that I'm missing?
now just use the gnome network administration tool and it should work
tried that... I set everything up
